caseTitle: Mst. Nasreen Zohra v. Multan Development Authority thr. its D.G. and another
tagline: The compliance of the provision of Section 31 of the Land Acquisition Act, 1894 by the Collector is mandatory for the simple reason that its non-compliance gives rise to penal consequences and such penal consequences are those as are provided in Section 34 of the Act i.e. interest prescribed therein will become payable.
